hero.subtitle: SkillSwap is a trusted community platform that lets you learn your dream skills for free while teaching what you know.

howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.subtitle: Start skill swapping in just 3 simple steps and gain new talents while helping others.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Add the skills you can teach and want to learn.

step2.title: Find Your Match
step2.description: Find the most suitable person with AI-powered search.

step3.title: Swap and Learn
step3.description: Schedule time on our secure platform and start learning.

howItWorks.securityDescription: All matches go through security checks, payments are protected by our platform, and we support you every step of the way.

categories.title: Featured
categories.subtitle: No matter what field you're talented in, you can match with the skill you want to learn and make your swap.
categories.ctaTitle: Can't find the category you're looking for?
categories.ctaDescription: SkillSwap has thousands of skills in 50+ different categories. Start exploring now and add your own skill!

testimonials.title: Thousands of Users
testimonials.subtitle: Listen to real experiences from our SkillSwap community and become part of these success stories.

ayse.name: Ayşe Demir
ayse.title: Graphic Designer
ayse.text: Thanks to SkillSwap, I learned English while sharing my graphic design knowledge. Amazing experience! I both learned and taught.

mehmet.name: Mehmet Kaya
mehmet.title: Software Developer
mehmet.text: I learned guitar while teaching React. The platform is very secure and user-friendly. I definitely recommend it!

zeynep.name: Zeynep Özkan
zeynep.title: Marketing Specialist
zeynep.text: I learned French by sharing my digital marketing knowledge. The community is very supportive and motivational.

can.name: Can Yılmaz
can.title: Music Teacher
can.text: I learned web design while teaching piano. SkillSwap's matching system is really successful!

elif.name: Elif Çelik
elif.title: Photographer
elif.text: I learned Italian by sharing my photography techniques. I both made new friends and became able to speak the language I dreamed of.
